name: ClpObjective
brief: Abstract base class for objective functions

algorithms.name:
Objective Function Interface (Gradient, Reduced Gradient, Step Length)
Defines the interface for objective functions in Clp. Derived classes
implement specific objective types (linear, quadratic, etc.).

Key methods that derived classes must implement:
- gradient(): Returns objective gradient at current solution
- reducedGradient(): Gradient accounting for basic/nonbasic structure
- stepLength(): Optimal step size in a given direction
- objectiveValue(): Evaluate objective at a point

The type_ member indicates the objective type: 1=linear, 2=quadratic.

see: ClpModel for how objectives are used in models
